title: 签名档字体怎么改大一些
author: 孤独秋叶

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 很大的字<FONT size=3>[size=7]很大的字[/size]</FONT>复制代码数字7可以改成1-7

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
[size=7]很大的字[/size]复制代码
又乱码了……

replies.author: 林扬骐
replies.txt_content:
可不可以更大？
[size=10]很大的字[/size]复制代码
很大的字

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content:
